sentences.sContent: I was angry with him for trying to delude me.
sentences.sCn: 他想骗我，因此我很恼火。

sentences.sContent: Don’t be deluded into thinking your house is burglarproof.
sentences.sCn: 不要误以为你的房子是绝对防盗的。

remMethod.val: de + lud(玩弄) + e → 玩弄别人 → 欺骗

trans.tranOther: to make someone believe something that is not true
